        public Localizer(Navigator navigator,
         Odometer odometer,
         EV3UltrasonicSensor usSensor,
         EV3ColorSensor colorSensor,
         double sensorDistance)
        Constructor for Localiser.
        Parameters:
        navigator - The robot's navigator.
        odometer - The robot's odometer whose values are to be set.
        usMotor - The motor responsible for rotating the ultrasonic sensor.
        usSensor - The ultrasonic sensor.
        colorSensor - The color sensor.
        colorDistance - The distance between the color sensor and the center of rotation of the robot.
